name.en: Super Galaxy King Lord of Galactica
name.ja: <ruby>超<rt>ちょう</rt></ruby><ruby>銀<rt>ぎん</rt></ruby><ruby>河<rt>が</rt></ruby><ruby>王<rt>おう</rt></ruby>ロード・オブ・ギャラクティカ

summoning_condition.en: You can Maximum Summon this card together with "Super Galaxy King Lord of Galactica [L]" and "Super Galaxy King Lord of Galactica [R]".

requirement.en: During the turn you Normal Summoned this card by Tributing a Galaxy Type Normal Monster.

effect.en: Add 2 Level 10 monsters from your Graveyard to your hand. Then, return this card to the owner's hand.
